html:
4.6.20  8:41 pm   Can you please make another history about a country it's really boring in quarantine and those videos are the best videos on the internet

     something you should know about that kind of video: it takes longer to produce a video like that than any quarantine will ever last. Unless, i am able to some how invent my way out of that predicament

4.6.20  8:10 pm   Your work makes me feel a certain way. Why?

     could be that little bit of crack cocaine i slipped in there

4.6.20  7:36 pm   How long is the journey on long long journey?

     average size

4.6.20  7:28 pm   how to fly a plane

     first you're gonna want to go ahead and find a cure for covid 19

4.6.20  7:17 pm   Is the new video comming this year or not?

     you're acting like i'm only gonna make 1 video. i'll tell you one thing for sure, videos are way too awesome to make just 1

4.6.20  7:07 pm   I've been thinking of making some music to get all my stress out, any advice for making something that'll hopefully calm me down when I'm upset?

     only you know the secret to doing this

4.6.20  6:41 pm   Do you have coronavirus in your omniverse 

     no

4.6.20  6:02 pm   have you discovered the endless possibilities of floor?

     some of them

     I have been laying on it for several hours now, and I must tell you - it is something else.

4.6.20  6:02 pm   why did you start to make music

     i don't remember, but probably because it's awesome

4.6.20  5:43 pm   what is watermelon?

     that's like if you took a melon and filled it with water

4.6.20  5:38 pm   What do you think of the outbreak of COVID-19?

     it was the next big thing, until it arrived. at which time it became the current big thing

4.6.20  5:04 pm   What do to if breathing?

     celebrate

4.6.20  4:53 pm   What's art?

     always

4.6.20  4:51 pm   Is this an epic moment

     yes

4.6.20  4:32 pm   ya wanna be on our podcast? 

     sure

4.6.20  3:13 pm   How many years have you been doing music

     you don't wanna know

4.6.20  3:07 pm   What's the status of your relationship with your front door?

     distant

4.6.20  2:43 pm   the covid situation might get you bored why not making videos? aee

     that reminds me of when i told my basketball team if they are bored why not just win the game

4.6.20  1:57 pm   I've been looking to become a content creator for some time now, but I need advice. How to I get over the initial fear of failure? how do I take that leap?

     i don't know. i'm scared of it myself

4.6.20  1:54 pm   Do you do all the editing in your videos yourself?

     oh man, wait til you find out who my editor is

4.6.20  1:53 pm   How would you define creative?

     would have to go ahead and create a definition

4.6.20  1:50 pm   Have you ever learned music theory?

     music theory is open source. which is convenient, because that way you can re-invent it when it melts, which is often

4.6.20  1:18 pm   How do I decide what kind(s) of thing(s) to develop proficiency at?

     it look(s) like you've clearly decided, it's parenthese(s)

4.6.20  12:51 pm   why is the songs page the only one that tells you how long the content is? the videos, instrumentals, improv, jazz and reality pages don't, even though the content there also has time lengths.

     maybe it's to give your mind a little extra something to look at. because there is nothing else really to look at, with an audio only song

4.6.20  12:29 pm   New vid coming this year

     you're acting like i'm only gonna make 1 video. i'll tell you one thing for sure, videos are way too awesome to make just 1

4.6.20  12:20 pm   are the path trains stuck under the hudson

     no

4.6.20  12:13 pm   Hey Bill! I was wondering... I know you're taking time to learn some new video editing software,

     it turns out, i'm gonna need a way to make the videos in the first place, besides just editing them

      but could you maybe divulge what you're learning? Thanks!

     i was thinking of training the program to swiftly carry out my every demand

4.6.20  12:12 pm   R u a person

     oh that would explain a lot

4.6.20  11:49 am   If those who work in your office went on vacation, how can they afford such a luxury if you haven't been paying them?

     might have quit

4.6.20  11:46 am   Is it possible to travel the world?

     yes but maybe not right now

4.6.20  11:32 am   Are there reasons behind songs?

     behind, in front, and baked right into the insides of them. also coating them around the edges

4.6.20  10:49 am   I've yet to receive the floor you mailed me 6 years ago, do you have an explanation ?

     i did not mail it

4.6.20  10:47 am   What does it mean to be alive?

     everything, anything,

4.6.20  10:45 am   I saw your post, "4.5.20  9:06 am    picture of bread?" with a link to a Google search for "billwurtz bread." Google is asking me if I meant, and by extension, you meant, "bill wurtz bread." Did you, by any chance, mean that?

     sort of, but my goal was to get the large thumbnail for my "bread" video to appear as the first result. i thought putting it as 1 word would most likely do that correctly. it worked for me, but who knows, google works in mysterious ways

4.6.20  10:09 am   what does your quarantine taste like?

     oatmeal, granola,

4.6.20  9:48 am   did you have a photos page on this site at some point or am i imagining things?

     i did not, but i might make one

4.6.20  9:11 am   Hey Bill, when will you talk about velcro?

     when it is more accepted in society

4.6.20  9:03 am   Why are you going to school theres is a virus.

     i don't recall ever going to school

4.6.20  8:39 am   bill. how do you handle it when youre trying to learn about something but all the resources available are frustratingly incomplete and focus on all the wrong things. Thank you 

     you may have to do your own research. may be difficult at first, but then you will soon start to become very powerful

4.6.20  8:19 am   Do you dream of cheese?

     not usually

4.6.20  7:16 am   What is my purpose ?

     everything

4.6.20  6:54 am   What was the bad thing you did?

     did a thing that was so medium it was entirely unclassifiable as good or bad

4.6.20  6:22 am   Is it true you are doing a big project 

     i guess you could look at it that way. if you consider the entire billwurtz media experience in general a project. but you must surely already know about that project by now

4.6.20  5:45 am   when will you make more reality vids?

     any time

4.6.20  4:44 am   Exactly how many videos do you plan on releasing once the countdown timer reaches zero?

     at least as many as the simpsons

4.6.20  4:17 am   hey billiam wurtzel, im a song writer, what would you recommend for some good inspiration?

     going outside, oops wait a minute

     also do you want to ride or die?

     preferably ride

      i agree

4.6.20  4:10 am   who is your inspiration on making videos

     everyone

4.6.20  4:09 am   Have you found your purpose for this life, on this planet, in this time?

     the more i find it, the more i realize there is still so much more to be found

     How did you make that happen,

     keep changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

      how do you know it's gonna stick?

     would prefer if it's there of its own free will and accord, not due to some adhesive

4.6.20  3:41 am   What's your favorite type of music

     normal

4.6.20  3:28 am   How does one aquire new skills

     you could make them up
